channel.title: q1b a.k.a Sukhpreet Singh
channel.description: Digital Open Home of Sukhpreet Singh aka `q1b` to bring forth the thoughts and share the learnings back to developers.

item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description: Welcome to my _new blog_ about learning Astro! Here, I will share my learning journey as I build a new website.

item.title: Advance Reuseable Astro Components using TypeScript
item.description: Perfect Pattern to built reuseable component with typescript supoprt, with few lines of code

item.title: Ideal Layout Component in Astro
item.description: Layout components in Astro provides a skeleton for your whole app, you can have multiple layouts component one for Home Page and Another for Blog Yet, here you will learn about handling SEO, og-image, fonts accross your app with a Wrapper Layout Component!
